uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.elda

Class EldaRouterRestlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.elda.EldaRouterRestlet

  • public class EldaRouterRestlet
extends Object
    Handles all incoming API calls and routes to appropriate locations.
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Dave Reynolds

    • Constructor Detail

      • EldaRouterRestlet

        public EldaRouterRestlet(@Context
                 javax.servlet.ServletContext con)
        Initialise this RouterRestlet. Happens a lot, so expensive initialisations should be cached. Sets the router used by this instance according to the appropriate LDA configs.

    • Method Detail

      • getRouterFor

        public static com.epimorphics.lda.routing.Router getRouterFor(javax.servlet.ServletContext con)
        Answer a router initialised with the URI templates appropriate to this context path. Such a router may already be in the routers table, in which case it is used, otherwise a new router is created, initialised, put in the table, and returned.
